languages.text: {n}Маражай пожимает плечом.{/n} "Кабал считай что мертв... и с ним умерли и {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}те, кто желал мне смерти{/d}. Теперь, когда меня не разыскивают убийцы, я волен принять любое решение". {n}Друкари заинтригованно хмыкает.{/n} "Странное ощущение. Я разберусь с этим позже, а пока что — нас с тобой ждет новая кровь и свежие страдания. Не желаю пропустить все веселье".

{n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай пожимает плечом.{/n} "Кабал считай что мертв... и с ним умерли и {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}те, кто желал мне смерти{/d}. Теперь, когда меня не разыскивают убийцы, я волен принять любое решение". {n}Друкари заинтригованно хмыкает.{/n} "Странное ощущение. Я разберусь с этим позже, а пока что — нас с тобой ждет новая кровь и свежие страдания. Не желаю пропустить все веселье".

I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se encoge de hombros.{/n} «La Kábala está prácticamente muerta... y con ella {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}todos los que me querían ver muerto{/d}. Ahora que ya no me persiguen asesinos, soy libre de elegir mi siguiente paso». {n}El Drukhari emite un sonido pensativo.{/n} «Es una sensación extraña. La afrontaré más adelante, pero por ahora nos esperan más sangre y sufrimiento y no quiero perderme la diversión».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se encoge de hombros.{/n} «La Kábala está prácticamente muerta... y con ella todos los que me querían ver muerto. Ahora que ya no me persiguen asesinos, soy libre de elegir mi siguiente paso». {n}El Drukhari hace un ruido pensativo.{/n} «Es una sensación extraña. La afrontaré más adelante, pero por ahora nos esperan más sangre y sufrimiento y no quiero perderme la diversión».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋耸耸肩。{/n}“阴谋团几乎已经被彻底消灭了……{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}所有想杀我的人也都死了{/d}。现在，已经没有刺客打算杀我了，我可以自由选择接下来该做些什么了。”{n}玛拉斋若有所思地说道。{/n}“这种感觉很古怪，我之后再来解决这个问题吧。至于现在，新的鲜血与新的苦难在等待着我们，我可不想错过这些乐趣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋耸耸肩。{/n}“阴谋团几乎已经被彻底消灭了……所有想杀我的人也都死了。现在，已经没有刺客打算杀我了，我可以自由选择接下来该做些什么了。”{n}玛拉斋若有所思地说道。{/n}“这种感觉很古怪，我之后再来解决这个问题吧。至于现在，新的鲜血与新的苦难在等待着我们，我可不想错过这些乐趣。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは肩をすくめる。{/n}「陰謀団は死んだも同然だ…そして{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}俺の死を望んでいた者は皆{/d}、陰謀団とともに滅びた。俺は、もはやアサシンに追われることはない。次のステップを自由に選ぶことができるのだ」{n}デュカーリは物思いにふけている。{/n}「不思議な気分だ。それについては後で考えよう。今は、とにかく新たな血と新たな苦しみが我々を待っている。楽しみを逃したくない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは肩をすくめる。{/n}「陰謀団は死んだも同然だ…そして俺の死を望んでいた者は皆、陰謀団とともに滅びた。俺は、もはやアサシンに追われることはない。次のステップを自由に選ぶことができるのだ」{n}デュカーリは物思いにふけている。 {/n}「不思議な気分だ。それについては後で考えよう。今は、とにかく新たな血と新たな苦しみが我々を待っている。楽しみを逃したくない」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hausse les épaules.{/n} « La Kabale est pour ainsi dire finie... et {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}tous ceux qui voulaient me voir mort{/d} ont disparu avec elle. Maintenant que je n'ai plus d'assassins aux trousses, je suis libre de faire ce qui me chante. » {n}Le Drukhari pousse un soupir songeur.{/n} « C'est une étrange sensation... mais ce n'est pas le moment de s'attarder là-dessus. Pour l'heure, du sang neuf et de la chair fraîche nous attendent et je ne voudrais surtout pas rater ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hausse les épaules.{/n} « La Kabale est pour ainsi dire finie... et tous ceux qui voulaient me voir mort ont disparu avec elle. Maintenant que je n'ai plus d'assassins aux trousses, je suis libre de faire ce qui me chante. » {n}Le Drukhari pousse un soupir songeur.{/n} « C'est une étrange sensation... mais ce n'est pas le moment de s'attarder là-dessus. Pour l'heure, du sang neuf et de la chair fraîche nous attendent et je ne voudrais surtout pas rater ça. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Die Kabale ist so gut wie tot ... und {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}jeder, der mich tot sehen wollte{/d}, ist mit ihr untergegangen. Da ich nun nicht länger von Attentätern gejagt werde, kann ich meine nächsten Schritte frei wählen." {n}Der Drukhari seufzt nachdenklich.{/n} "Es ist ein merkwürdiges Gefühl. Ich werde später damit ringen, doch nun erwarten uns neues Blut und frisches Leid. Ich will den ganzen Spaß nicht verpassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

Da ich nun nicht länger von Attentätern gejagt werde, kann ich meine nächsten Schritte frei wählen." {n}Der Drukhari seufzt nachdenklich.{/n} "Es ist ein merkwürdiges Gefühl. Ich werde später damit ringen, doch nun erwarten uns neues Blut und frisches Leid. Ich will den ganzen Spaß nicht verpassen."

Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Artık Kabal falan kalmadı... {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}Beni öldürmek isteyenler{/d} de o arada ölüp gitti. Peşimde suikastçı kalmadığından sıradaki adımlarımı özgürce atabilirim." {n}Drukhari, düşünceli bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Çok tuhaf bir hismiş... Bir ara odaklanacağım ama şimdi bizi bekleyen taze kanlar, tadılacak ızdıraplar var. Böyle bir eğlenceyi hayatta kaçırmam."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shrugs.{/n} "The Kabal is as good as dead... and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Corsair}everyone who wanted me dead{/d} has perished along with it. Now that I am no longer being hunted by assassins, I am free to choose my next steps." {n}The Drukhari makes a pensive sound.{/n} "It is a strange feeling. I will grapple with that later, but for now, new blood and fresh suffering await us. I would hate to miss all the fun."

Artık peşimde suikastçı kalmadığından, sıradaki adımlarımı özgürce atabilirim." {n}Drukhari, düşünceli bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Çok tuhaf bir hismiş... Bir ara odaklanacağım ama şimdi bizi bekleyen taze kanlar, tadılacak ızdıraplar var. Böyle bir eğlenceyi hayatta kaçırmam."
